Q_DESC:
Write a program to calculate volumes of different shapes by overloading the function area.The shapes include cylinder,cube,sphere.
The parameters required for area calculation is taken from the user
Input:
First line contains the radius and height of cylinder
Second line contains side of a cube
Third line contains radius of a sphere
TESTCASE_1:
5 3
10
10
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Volume of cylinder is 235.5
Volume of cube is 1000
Volume of sphere is 4186.67
TESTCASE_2:
10 10
10
10
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Volume of cylinder is 3140
Volume of cube is 1000
Volume of sphere is 4186.67
TESTCASE_3:
5 5 
5
5
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Volume of cylinder is 392.5
Volume of cube is 125
Volume of sphere is 523.333
